ðŸ“– Summary: Coral NPU is an open-source, energy-efficient hardware accelerator IP designed for machine learning inference, particularly for ultra-low-power edge devices like wearables. It is based on the RISC-V ISA and features specialized matrix, vector, and scalar processing units.
